p:
Court is that said S.P. White is guilty of the offense of causing the death of A. Beardon and are therefore commit him to jail to await the action of the grand jury S.M. Carpenter Justice of the Peace Witnesses for Prosecution Oc Rodgers John Januk Frank Beardon E.A. Portch Henry Beardon Howard Portch John Januk
Filed March 5th 1885 Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk
